**Overview**

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) solicitation from Veterans Affairs Canada for virtual French language training services. The successful contractor will provide full-time, one-on-one French second language training through virtual learning (MS Teams). The objective is to help employees attain specific levels in their second language within a stipulated timeframe.

**Scope of Work**

The contractor must provide training to help employees attain the following levels in their second language:

* Level "C" in comprehension (reading)
* Level "B" in writing
* Level "C" in oral interaction

The contractor will execute the work in accordance with the Statement of Work. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Privileges and Permits**

This solicitation is open to all qualified vendors. There are no security requirements or trade agreements associated with this bid solicitation.

**Andre raffraichis period**



This contract will run from the contract date to January 30, 2024. Please note that the contract's duration may be extended with mutual agreement between the contracting parties.
